PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^13.18 -Sentinel League - Righteous Fire FAQ -->https://tinyurl.com/2p93p7rs --> https://www.twitch.tv/pohx^7^7^7
Some things to note. The "Endgame" gear shown is gear you can aim for about 1-2 weeks into the league. You can expect to hit 5m+ DPS with Big Investment, 8M+ Using VAAL Rf with very good gear
Don't forget to Toggle on "^xB97123Targets are Ignited^7" You'll be iginiting bosses with Firetrap Might have to Uncheck ^x7070FFArcane Surge^7 in the later setups since the build gets tight on sockets and might not be able to run it (depends on if you have to lifetap ur flamedash or not)
Also make sure you Enable/Disable the Lower/Higher Level Righteous Fire depending on what stage of gear you're on
To Save Some points 1 Point for getting ^x7070FFbelt enchant^7 for ^x7070FFCurse reduction^7 (The mastery on Arm/Es Nodes) 1 Point for getting^x70FF70 More DEX^7 usually via accessories or ^x70FF70Brutal Restraint Timeless Jewel^7 @Templar ( You can drop the DEX node by duelist) For Brutal Restraint Questions go here --> https://tinyurl.com/RFFaQ
^xD02090Gearing Priority Order (Will flucuate based on market prices which I can't really predict)^7 ^x70FF70 6L Chest^7 --> ^x70FF70Usually Emperor of Purity or any Arm/ES ^1 You will Need to Craft Life 9%-10% Gained as ES via Gravicious Unveil ^7^7^7 (I usually get this right around mapping since it's much better than a tabula) ^xB97123 ^xE05030^xB97123^x70FF70Ashes of the Stars ^1 /w Charisma Annoited to fit in Skitterbots^7^7^7 (You need 18% Mana Reservation minimum) This is a MASSIVE Damage increase
^xE05030^x70FF70Legacy of Fury boots^7^7^7^7 ^1 This is the biggest boost for clear ^7^7^7Scorch is also a very nice damage boost. ^xE05030 ^x70FF70Master of Fire Cluster Jewel^7^7 ^1 DO NOT spend a lot of currency on this early ^7^7^7 You can also opt out for Exposure on gloves but you will clear a bit slower but it works just fine ^xD02090 ^x70FF70Elder 82+ Helmet^7 ^1 You will craft with Horror Essences for ^7^7^7 ^xB97123Level 16 Burning damage^7 or ^x7070FFLevel 16 Concentrated Effect ^7This part can be very expensive if unlucky so consider having 20+ Essences or buying a cheaper helmet^7
Jewels with ^xE05030%Life^7 & Burning Damage or^xE05030 Fire Multi^7 (These are like 50C+ in current league ArchNem for 3 property jewels, I bought 3 when I got my Master of Fire Cluster)
^xD02090^xAF6025^x70FF70Replica Soul Tether^7^7^7 (You want this going into ^xE05030RED^7 tier maps) If you are going Max block with aegis do not use Corrupted Soul
Lots of players are also going Aegis Aurora & Melding of the Flesh. This is a good option for players who want to be more tanky but it comes with a big loss of damage & much more strict gearing. I find myself only going this variant if I want to farm Double Beyond maps I do not have a PoB template since I did not play that route this league
^xE05030Please remember this version of my RF Build is the Non-Explode Setup. For the Explode Setup you follow a different Guide because of it's demands^7^7 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- - ^xFFFF77RF Explode PoB: https://pastebin.com/g9ECEEGd (Expensive^7) ^xFFFF77For any other questions, check out Pohx's youtube videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/PohxKappa/videos^7^7
Some info for shield craft (not mine just a reddit post) https://old.reddit.com/r/pathofexile/comments/t2whtg/finished_crafting_my_shield_for_my_rf_inquisitor/hyorptc/

Skill.label: Freezing Pulse OR Rolling Magma (Use till lvl 4)
Flame Wall (Drop infront of your totem)
Holy Flame Totem (Your main skill at lvl 4)
If you find Holy Flame Totem to be too slow
You can go Orb of Storms + Stormblast Mine
Vitality (Make sure to grab reservation mastery)
^4Purchase RF From Act II Vendor to Level for Swap
Vortex (NOT NEEDED but if you lack dmg use it)
^2Gems to Purchase from Library Act III (Click Me)
Righteous Fire (If in 4L Drop last 2 Gems)
Frost Blink (Might not need lifetap if mana is ok)
Stone Golem (I usually drop this around red maps)
^5Warcry ^7 you will use Enduring or Infernal
If you can't get 3G Swap Swift Afflic for Efficacy
^6Swap Flam for Ele Weakness When you Get Ashes

Items.Item: Rarity: MAGIC Flame Shaper's Driftwood Sceptre Crafted: true Prefix: {range:0.5}GlobalFireSpellGemsLevel1_ Suffix: None Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B LevelReq: 1 Implicits: 1 {tags:elemental_damage,damage,elemental}10% increased Elemental Damage +1 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems {tags:dot_multi,elemental_damage,unveiled_mod,damage,elemental,fire}{crafted}{range:0.5}+(18-20)% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier

Rarity: RARE Pandemonium Smasher Crystal Sceptre Unique ID: fa54938b87beb3f160b8ad9fff77d573022afd1084ddee46662d3edd135fc9b8 Item Level: 82 Quality: 30 Sockets: R R R LevelReq: 41 Implicits: 3 {crafted}Quality does not increase Physical Damage {crafted}Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality 30% increased Elemental Damage +32% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier 52% increased Fire Damage Adds 1 to 5 Lightning Damage to Spells +37% to Fire Resistance {crafted}30% increased Damage over Time Refer to the Crafting Guide to craft a weapon

Rarity: RARE Energy Shield Shield Titanium Spirit Shield Energy Shield: 80 EnergyShieldBasePercentile: 0 Warlord Item Crafted: true Prefix: {range:0.803}IncreasedLife7 Prefix: {range:0.162}FireDamagePrefixOnWeapon5_ Prefix: {range:0.212}MaximumFireResistanceHighInfluence3 Suffix: None Suffix: None Suffix: None Quality: 20 Sockets: B-B-B LevelReq: 68 Implicits: 0 52% increased Fire Damage +77 to maximum Life +3% to maximum Fire Resistance {tags:elemental,cold,lightning,resistance}{crafted}{range:0.5}+(17-20)% to Cold and Lightning Resistances With the new change of some Influenced mods being added to the core pool we can just ID Regular ES shields for max fire res Note that you can only get high values of % Fire Damage on ES Shields Also you can get +1 Gems
